Title: Spice Up Your Life
Description:
Flames blessing to you, $n.

Trade has been going well now the Ringing Deeps are safe once again and things have, relatively, calmed down. Despite that, our General still won't breathe easily. She's wound tight and it's not healthy. An unhealthy general leads to an unhealthy army. 

So a day with the family. Can you pick some herbs for the meal? You'll want the big ones, don't bother with the small ones.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Auralia Steelstrike at the Steelstrike Home in Mereldar.
CompletionText: Herbs bathed in the light of Beledar have a fantastic taste.
RewardText: These will be wonderful, well done.
